lyrics:
17 contributorswhere i come from lyricsverse 1
well i was rollin wheels and shiftin gears round that jersey turnpike
when barney stopped me with his gun ten minutes after midnight
said sir you broke the limit in this rusty old truck
i dont know about that accent son just where did you come from

chorus
i said where i come from its cornbread and chicken
where i come from a lot of front porch sittin
where i come from tryin to make a livin
and workin hard to get to heaven where i come from

verse 2
well i was south of detroit city i pulled in this country kitchen
to try their brand of barbecue the sign said fingerlickin
well i paid the tab and the lady asked me howd i like my biscuit
ill be honest with you maam it aint like mama fixed it

chorus
cause where i come from its cornbread and chicken
where i come from lot of front porch pickin
where i come from tryin to make a livin
and workin hard to get to heaven where i come from

verse 3
i was chasin sun on 101 somewhere around ventura
and i lost a universal joint and i had to use my finger
this tall lady stopped and asked if i had plans for dinner
said no thanks maam back home we like the girls whod sing soprano
see alan jackson liveget tickets as low as 22you might also likechorus
cause where i come from its cornbread and chicken
where i come from a lot of front porch sittin
where i come from tryin to make a livin
and workin hard to get to heaven where i come from

verse 4
well i was headin home on 65 somewhere around kentucky
and the cb rang for the bobtail rig its rollin on like thunder
well i answered him and he asked me arent you from out in tulsa
nah but you mightve seen me there i just dropped a load of salsa

chorus
where i come from its cornbread and chicken
where i come from a lot of front porch pickin
where i come from tryin to make a livin
and workin hard to get to heaven where i comeâ€”
where i come from yeah its cornbread and chicken
where i come from a lot of back porch pickin
where i come from tryin to make a livin
and workin hard to get to heaven where i come from

outro
where i come from
yeah where i come from
a lot of front porch sittin
and starin up at heaven where i come from
where i come from
trying to make a livin
oh where i come from
where i come from2embed
